title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-3.5 - Monitoring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-3.5 - Monitoring

State Regulations
(a) The agency
reservoir releases manager shall be responsible for monitoring the total
available amount of water stored in the Croton System reservoirs and for
notifying the department reservoir releases manager at least 24 hours prior to
an anticipated change from one reservoir storage condition to
another. (b) The agency reservoir
releases manager shall be responsible for monitoring the water inflow into the

Croton System reservoirs and for notifying the department reservoir releases
manager at least 24 hours prior to an anticipated change from one stream flow
condition to another. Notes
